subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: Redemption is usually considered a personal matter, but an entire nation will be ready to cheer on Ian Bell in the quest to rescue his test cricket career as the Ashes series between England and Australia resumes on Thursday.
snippet: Redemption is usually considered a personal matter, but an entire nation will be ready to cheer on Ian Bell in the quest to rescue his test cricket career as the Ashes series between England and Australia resumes on Thursday.
